SCTX:
Begin WitchNoteScript

short done
short OnPCEquip
short PCSkipEquip

if ( done == 1 )
	set PCSkipEquip to 0
	return
endif
set PCSkipEquip to 1

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Lycanthropycure >= 0 )
	if ( onactivate == 1 )
		Journal "BM_Lycanthropycure" 10
		set done to 1
		activate
		endif
	endif
endif

;if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BrodirGrove < 20 )
	;if ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
		;set done to 1
		;activate
	;endif
;endif


if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Lycanthropycure >= 0 )
	if ( OnPCEquip == 1 ) 
		Journal "BM_Lycanthropycure" 10
		set done to 1
		activate
			endif
	endif
endif

End WitchNoteScript
